### [Working with proxy objects](/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCConnection/synchronousRemoteObjectProxyWithErrorHandler(_:)#Working-with-proxy-objects)

[`func remoteObjectProxyWithErrorHandler((any Error) -> Void) -> Any`](/documentation/foundation/nsxpcconnection/remoteobjectproxywitherrorhandler(_:))Returns a proxy for the remote object (that is, the object exported from the other side of this connection) with the specified error handler.
